sourcesContent:
<template>

</template>


<script>
import {
  getFirestore,
  collection,
  onSnapshot,
  query,
} from "firebase/firestore";

export default {
  name: "App",
  components: {
  },
  data() {
    return { 
      producto: { color: "", columna: ""},
      productos: [],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async getProducts() {
      const db = getFirestore();
      const q = query(collection(db, "jirafe"));
      onSnapshot(q, (querySnapshot) => {
        const productos = [];
        this.productos = [];
        querySnapshot.forEach((doc) => {
          productos.push({ id: doc.id, data: doc.data() });
        });
        this.productos = productos;
      });
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getProducts();
  },
};
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
